name: linkedin-vs-handshake
description: Discussion about when to update LinkedIn versus Handshake after receiving offers.

events.content: When do you update LinkedIn after accepting an internship? Right away or closer to summer?
I update LinkedIn once onboarding paperwork is done. For Handshake, wait until the employer posts the official positionâ€”you can mark it as 'accepted' under experiences.
If you're still interviewing, maybe hold off broadcasting it everywhere so you can keep options open.
